channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- remarkable node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- remarkable node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16006|2024-09-17T03:01:59.476Z -- hackerone -- remarkable%20node%20module
item.description: Remarkable is a markdown parser. In versions 1.6.2 and lower, remarkable allows the use of `data:` URIs in links and can therefore execute javascript.
